00642 class command_line_parameters_parser : boost::noncopyable {
00643     typedef detail::common_checker< parameters, detail::parameter_parts_extractor, std::string > checker;
00644     typedef boost::ptr_vector< checker >    common_checkers;
00645     typedef common_checkers::iterator       checker_it;
00646     typedef common_checkers::const_iterator checker_const_it;
00647 public:
00648     command_line_parameters_parser() : 
00649             name_value_separator( "=" ) {} 
00650 public:
00651     parameter& add_parameter( const std::string& short_name
00652                              , const std::string& full_name
00653                              , void ( *fn )() ) {
00654         return create_parameter( short_name, full_name, fn );
00655     }
00656

00658     parameter& add_parameter( const std::string& short_name
00659                              , const std::string& full_name
00660                              , void ( *fn )( const ArgType& ) ) {
00661         return create_parameter( short_name, full_name, fn );
00662     }

00666                              , const std::string& full_name
00667                              , void ( *fn )( ArgType ) ) {
00668         return create_parameter( short_name, full_name, fn );
00669     }

00671     parameter& add_parameter( const std::string& single_name
00672                               , void ( *fn )() ) {
00673         return create_parameter( single_name, "", fn );
00674     }

00679         return create_parameter( single_name, "", fn );

00694                              , const std::string& full_name 
00695                              , ObjectType* obj
00696                              , void ( ObjectType::*fn )() ) {
00697         return create_parameter( short_name, full_name, obj, fn );
00698     }

00807     template
00808     < 
00809         typename ObjectType
00810         , typename ArgType
00811     > 
00812     parameter& add_parameter( const std::string& single_name
00813                              , ObjectType* obj
00814                              , void ( ObjectType::*fn )( ArgType ) const ) {  
00815         return create_parameter( single_name, "", obj, fn );
00816     }
00817 private:
00818     parameters registered_parameters;
00819 private:
00820     template< typename PtrToFun >
00821     parameter& create_parameter( const std::string&  short_name
00822                                 , const std::string& full_name
00823                                 , const PtrToFun&    ptr_to_fun ) { 
00824         check_null_ptr( ptr_to_fun, short_name );
00825         check_names_validity( short_name, full_name );
00826 
00827         registered_parameters += parameter( short_name, full_name, ptr_to_fun );
00828         return registered_parameters.back();
00829     }
00830 
00831     template
00832     < 
00833         typename PtrToObj
00834         , typename PtrToObjFun
00835     >
00836     parameter& create_parameter( const std::string&  short_name
00837                                 , const std::string& full_name
00838                                 , const PtrToObj&    ptr_to_obj
00839                                 , const PtrToObjFun& ptr_to_fun ) {
00840         check_null_ptr( ptr_to_obj, short_name );
00841         check_null_ptr( ptr_to_fun, short_name );
00842         check_names_validity( short_name, full_name );
00843         
00844         registered_parameters += parameter( short_name, full_name, ptr_to_obj, ptr_to_fun );
00845         return registered_parameters.back();
00846     }
00847 private:
00848     template< typename Ptr >
00849     void check_null_ptr( const Ptr& ptr, const std::string& parameter_name ) const {
00850         if ( 0 == ptr ) {
00851             const std::string what_happened =
00852                 "Zero pointer (function/object/method) detected for parameter '" + parameter_name + "'!";
00853             throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00854         } else {}
00855     }
00856 
00857     void check_names_validity( const std::string& short_name, const std::string& full_name ) const {
00858         check_spaces_existence_in( short_name );
00859         check_spaces_existence_in( full_name );
00860         check_equality_of( short_name, full_name );
00861         check_uniqueness_of( short_name );
00862         check_uniqueness_of( full_name );
00863     }
00864 
00865     void check_spaces_existence_in( const std::string& name ) const {
00866         if ( boost::contains( name, " " ) ) {
00867             const std::string what_happened = 
00868                     "Invalid parameter's name '" + name + "', it shouldn't contains space(s)!";
00869             throw std::runtime_error( what_happened );
00870         } else {}
00871     }
00872 
00873     void check_equality_of( const std::string& short_name, const std::string& full_name ) const {
00874         if ( short_name == full_name ) {
00875             const std::string what_happened = "Equal names of parameter: '"
00876                                               + short_name + "', '" + full_name + "'!";
00877             throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00878         } else {}
00879     }
00880     
00881     void check_uniqueness_of( const std::string& name ) const {
00882         parameter_const_it it = std::find( registered_parameters.begin()
00883                                            , registered_parameters.end()
00884                                            , name );
00885         if ( registered_parameters.end() != it ) {
00886             const std::string what_happened = "Parameter with name '" + name + "' already exists!";
00887             throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00888         } else {}
00889     } 
00890 private:
00891     std::string name_value_separator;
00892     common_checkers checkers;
00893     detail::parameter_parts_extractor_p extractor;
00894 public:
00895     void set_value_separator( char separator ) {
00896         check_printable_of( separator );
00897         name_value_separator = separator;
00898     }
00899 private:
00900     void check_printable_of( char separator ) const {
00901         const int ascii_code = separator;
00902         if ( ascii_code <= 0x20 ) {
00903             const std::string what_happened = "Symbol (ASCII-code is "
00904                                               + detail::to_str( separator )
00905                                               + ") is not suitable for name-value separator!";
00906             throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00907         } else {}
00908     }
00909 public:
00910     void parse( int argc, char** argv ) {
00911         detail::str_storage inputed_parameters = obtain_parameters_from( argc, argv );
00912         if ( there_is_nothing_to_parse( inputed_parameters ) ) {
00913             return;
00914         } else {}
00915         
00916         create_parameter_parts_extractor();
00917         create_parameters_checkers();
00918         base_checks( inputed_parameters );
00919         handle_unnamed_parameters( inputed_parameters );
00920         remaining_checks( inputed_parameters );
00921         call_corresponding_user_functions( inputed_parameters );
00922     }
00923 private:
00924     detail::str_storage obtain_parameters_from( int argc, char** argv ) const {
00925         detail::str_storage inputed_parameters;
00926         for ( int i = 1; i < argc; ++i ) {
00927             inputed_parameters += argv[i];
00928         }
00929         return inputed_parameters;
00930     }
00931     
00932     bool there_is_nothing_to_parse( const detail::str_storage& inputed_parameters ) const {
00933         return inputed_parameters.empty() 
00934                && no_parameters_with_default_value()
00935                && no_necessary_parameters();
00936     }
00937 
00938     bool no_parameters_with_default_value() const {
00939         parameter_const_it it = std::find_if( registered_parameters.begin()
00940                                               , registered_parameters.end()
00941                                               , boost::mem_fn( &parameter::has_default_value ) );
00942         return registered_parameters.end() == it;
00943     }
00944 
00945     bool no_necessary_parameters() const {
00946         parameter_const_it it = std::find_if( registered_parameters.begin()
00947                                               , registered_parameters.end()
00948                                               , boost::mem_fn( &parameter::it_is_necessary ) );
00949         return registered_parameters.end() == it;
00950     }
00951     
00952     void handle_unnamed_parameters( detail::str_storage& inputed_parameters ) {
00953         detail::unnamed_parameters_handler handle( registered_parameters
00954                                                    , *extractor
00955                                                    , name_value_separator );
00956         handle( inputed_parameters );
00957     }
00958 
00959     void create_parameter_parts_extractor() {
00960         extractor.reset( new detail::parameter_parts_extractor( name_value_separator ) );
00961     } 
00962 
00963     void create_parameters_checkers() {
00964         using namespace detail;
00965 
00966         checkers.push_back( 
00967                 new parameters_existence_checker( registered_parameters, *extractor, name_value_separator ) );
00968         checkers.push_back( 
00969                 new parameters_redundancy_checker( registered_parameters, *extractor, name_value_separator ) ); 
00970         checkers.push_back( 
00971                 new parameters_repetition_checker( registered_parameters, *extractor, name_value_separator ) );
00972         checkers.push_back( 
00973                 new incorrect_parameters_checker( registered_parameters, *extractor, name_value_separator ) ); 
00974         checkers.push_back( 
00975                 new necessary_parameters_checker( registered_parameters, *extractor, name_value_separator ) );
00976         checkers.push_back( 
00977                 new parameters_values_checker( registered_parameters, *extractor, name_value_separator ) );
00978         checkers.push_back( 
00979                 new values_semantic_checker( registered_parameters, *extractor, name_value_separator ) );
00980     }
00981     
00982     void base_checks( const detail::str_storage& inputed_parameters ) {
00983         const size_t base_checkers_quantity = 3;
00984         for ( checker_const_it it = checkers.begin();
00985               checkers.begin() + base_checkers_quantity != it;
00986               ++it ) {
00987             it->check( inputed_parameters );
00988         }
00989         checkers.erase( checkers.begin(), checkers.begin() + base_checkers_quantity );
00990     }
00991     
00992     void remaining_checks( const detail::str_storage& inputed_parameters ) {
00993         for ( checker_const_it it = checkers.begin(); checkers.end() != it; ++it ) {
00994             it->check( inputed_parameters );
00995         }
00996     }
00997 
00998     void call_corresponding_user_functions( const detail::str_storage& inputed_parameters ) {
00999         detail::user_functions_caller caller( registered_parameters, *extractor, name_value_separator );
01000         caller.call( inputed_parameters );
01001     }
01002 };
01003 
01005 typedef command_line_parameters_parser command_line_parameter_parser;
01006 
01007 } // namespace clpp
01008 
01010 namespace clp_parser = clpp;
